task.title: How to Use the Document Scanner
task.shortdesc: The document scanner can be used to display paper documents on the projector for everyone in the classroom to see. This is very helpful when you need to show the entire group something that is in paper format.

taskbody.context: Below are the steps for using the document scanner in the classroom.

step.cmd: Power on the document scanner by pressing the power button.

Click the document scanner application on the computer desktop. A new window will open up with an application that allows you to interface with document scanner. This program allows to adjust how the image looks like on the screen, which will also be displayed on the projector.
Press the projector screen switch down to drop the projector screen
Grab the remote for the projector.
Press the power button on the remote and wait for the projector to turn on.
